prod_desc: Take down the Ultron jet with super-jumping Iron Man!
prod_long_desc:
Team up with Iron Man MK45 to take on the Ultron army in an ultimate battle! Defend against aerial attacks from the Ultron vehicle piloted by the Ultron Sentry Officer. Take cover as Ultron Sentries leap from the back of the vehicle and fire their stud shooters. Then activate Iron Man’s Super Jumper to topple the Ultron Sentry Officer and bring the vehicle crashing to the ground! Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories: Ultron Sentry Officer, 2 Ultron Sentries and Iron Man MK45.
Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories: Ultron Sentry Officer, 2 Ultron Sentries and Iron Man MK45
Ultron vehicle features 2 antennas, adjustable wings and attachment points for Ultron Sentries
Weapons include 2 stud shooters
Accessories include Iron Man’s iconic helmet, thrusters and Super Jumper (new for spring 2015), and the Ultron Sentries’ thrusters
Take on the Ultron army with Iron Man MK45
Dodge the Ultron Sentries’ stud shooters
Topple the Ultron SentryOfficer with super-jumping Iron Man!
Ultron vehicle measures over 5” high, 3” long and 3” wide
